trans-unit.source: Building the Documentation
trans-unit.target: 建立文件

trans-unit.source: For support or general discussions please join the Mythril community on Discord.
trans-unit.target: 如需支持或一般性讨论，请加入Discord上的Mythril社区。

trans-unit.source: Get it with Docker:
trans-unit.target: 用Docker获取它：

trans-unit.source: If you are a smart contract developer, we recommend using MythX tools which are optimized for usability and cover a wider range of security issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是精明的合同开发人员，我们建议使用MythX工具，这些工具针对可用性进行了优化，并且涵盖了广泛的安全问题。

trans-unit.source: Install from Pypi:
trans-unit.target: 从Pypi安装。

trans-unit.source: Installation and setup
trans-unit.target: 安装和设置

trans-unit.source: Instructions for using Mythril are found on the docs.
trans-unit.target: 在文档上找到使用Mythril的说明。

trans-unit.source: Mythril
trans-unit.target: Mythril

trans-unit.source: Mythril is a security analysis tool for EVM bytecode. It detects security vulnerabilities in smart contracts built for Ethereum, Hedera, Quorum, Vechain, Roostock, Tron and other EVM-compatible blockchains. It uses symbolic execution, SMT solving and taint analysis to detect a variety of security vulnerabilities. It's also used (in combination with other tools and techniques) in the MythX security analysis platform.
trans-unit.target: Mythril是用于EVM字节码的安全分析工具。它检测为以太坊，Hedera，Quorum，Vechain，Roostock，Tron和其他EVM兼容区块链构建的智能合约中的安全漏洞。它使用符号执行，SMT解决方案和污点分析来检测各种安全漏洞。MythX安全分析平台中还使用了它（与其他工具和技术结合使用）。

trans-unit.source: Mythril's documentation is contained in the docs folder and is published to Read the Docs. It is based on Sphinx and can be built using the Makefile contained in the subdirectory:
trans-unit.target: Mythril的文档包含在 docs 文件夹中，并已发布为Read the Docs。它基于Sphinx，可以使用子目录中包含的Makefile构建：

trans-unit.target: 或者:

trans-unit.source: Run:
trans-unit.target: 运行。

trans-unit.source: Security analysis tool for Ethereum smart contracts
trans-unit.target: Ethereum智能合约的安全分析工具

trans-unit.source: See the docs for more detailed instructions.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细说明，请参见文档。

trans-unit.source: Specify the maximum number of transaction to explore with -t <number>. You can also set a timeout with --execution-timeout <seconds>. Example (source code):
trans-unit.target: 使用 -t <number> 指定要探索的最大事务数。您也可以使用 --execution-timeout <seconds> 设置超时。示例（源代码）：

trans-unit.source: This will create a build output directory containing the HTML output. Alternatively, PDF documentation can be built with make latexpdf. The available output format options can be seen with make help.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个包含HTML输出的 build 输出目录。另外，可以使用 make latexpdf 构建PDF文档。可用的输出格式选项可以在 make help 中看到。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Visit the Smart Contract Vulnerability Classification Registry to find detailed information and remediation guidance for the vulnerabilities reported.
trans-unit.target: 访问智能合约漏洞分类注册表，以找到有关所报告漏洞的详细信息和补救指南。

trans-unit.source: Vulnerability Remediation
trans-unit.target: 漏洞修复

trans-unit.source: Whether you want to contribute, need support, or want to learn what we have cooking for the future, our Discord server will serve your needs.
trans-unit.target: 无论您是要做出贡献，需要支持，还是想了解我们未来的烹饪方法，我们的Discord服务器都能满足您的需求。
